tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hi , I want to share my story , I fell in the bathroom. A year later, I had severe pain in my right knee and was having trouble walking. I met Dr. Arun, who recommended that I undergo an arthroscopic ACL reconstruction and partial meniscectomy on my right knee. At the time, I was very nervous and afraid of the procedure, but he gave me a lot of confidence and assured me that I would be able to walk properly and pain-free. My family and I trusted him, and we carried out the operation, and now, after two years, I'm fit and well. He is the best surgeon; the way he treats me makes me feel fearless and confident. His team also takes great care of me. Thanks a lot Sir.

review: Myself Mrs  K.  Anita  from Humnabad - Karnataka. My mother was admitted in Deccan hospital Somajiguda under Dr Arun Kumar orthopaedic sergen, for her both knee replacement and one hip replacement and believe me we we're very scared that how we can handle her but thanks to Dr Arun sir he did not make her realise that her knees has been replaced.  The way he and his team take care and make patients  comfortable awesome. we got discharge from hospital once again sir thanks a lot for your special care.

review:
**** **** ******* Dr.Arun performed femur fracture surgery on my father.
the surgery was performed by inserting a rod and the bones were not aligned closely ; due to this the union did not take place as there was a gap between the fractured bones 
** *** ****** ************** ** *** **** ** **** ******* ***** ***** * **** *** ******** ** ******* ** ** ***** ************* ** not recommended to approach this doctor.
